function loadmore() { if (typeof window["CryptoJS"] === "undefined") { loadScript("https://www.ebookcdn.com/bookjs/js/crypto-js.min.js", loadmore); return; } var token = CryptoJS.HmacMD5(bookID.toString(), bookID.toString()); var node = document.querySelector("div.chapterlist"); var moreurl = "/read/Chapter/" + bookID + ".js?token=" + token; var httpRequest = new XMLHttpRequest(); httpRequest.open('GET', moreurl, true); httpRequest.onload = function () { if (this.status === 200 || this.status === 304) { node.innerHTML = this.responseText; document.querySelectorAll("a.loadmore")[0].style.display = 'none'; document.querySelectorAll("a.loadmore")[1].style.display = 'none'; load = true; } } httpRequest.send(); }

var httpRequest = new XMLHttpRequest();
    var token = CryptoJS.HmacMD5(cid.toString(), navigator.userAgent).toString();
    httpRequest.open('GET', `/read/Content/${cid}.js?token=${token}&t=${new Date().valueOf()}`, true);
    httpRequest.onload = function () {
        if (this.status === 200) {
            var result = this.responseText;
            var url = "https://txt.yqkfqrc.com";
            url += CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(result, CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(token.substr(0, 16)), { iv: CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(token.substr(16)), mode: CryptoJS.mode.CBC, padding: CryptoJS.pad.Pkcs7 }).toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8);
            url += "&t=" + new Date().valueOf();
            var httpRequest2 = new XMLHttpRequest();
            httpRequest2.open('GET', url, true);
            httpRequest2.overrideMimeType("text/plain;charset=gb2312");
            httpRequest2.onerror = function () {
	alert("ä½ æ“ä½œçš„å¤ªé¢‘ç¹äº†ï¼Œè¯·ç¨åå†è¯•...ï¼");
                window.location.reload();
            };

ruleContent.content: const chapID = java.hexDecodeToString(result); var ua = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36"; var token = java.HMacHex(chapID , 'HmacMD5', ua); var headers = {"User-Agent": ua}; var option = { "headers": headers }; var getUrl= `https://www.bqxs520.com/read/Content/${chapID}.js?token=${token}&t=${Date.now()},` + JSON.stringify(option); var resp = String(java.ajax(getUrl)); var url = "https://txt.yqkfqrc.com"; url += CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(resp, CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(token.substr(0, 16)), { iv: CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(token.substr(16)), mode: CryptoJS.mode.CBC, padding: CryptoJS.pad.Pkcs7 }).toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8); url += "&t=" + Date.now(); result = java.ajax(url); ##\s{2,}##

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var bookList = [];
var nameCount = {};

// å‡è®¾srcæ˜¯å·²ç»å­˜åœ¨äºå½“å‰é¡µé¢çš„JSONæ•°æ®å¯¹è±¡
var data = JSON.parse(src); // å°†srcè§£æä¸ºJSONå¯¹è±¡

// æ£€æŸ¥å“åº”çŠ¶æ€æ˜¯å¦æˆåŠŸ
if (data.c === "200" && data.m === "æˆåŠŸå“åº”" && data.data) {
    if (Array.isArray(data.data) && data.data.length > 0) {
        // éå†data.dataæ•°ç»„ï¼Œæ„å»ºä¹¦ç±åˆ—è¡¨ï¼ˆå¤„ç†å¤šä¸ªä¹¦ç±æƒ…å†µï¼‰
        data.data.forEach(function (item) {
            var name = item.book_name || "";
            // å¤„ç†åŒåä¹¦ç±
            if (nameCount[name]!== undefined) {
                nameCount[name]++;
                name += " (" + nameCount[name] + ")";
            } else {
                nameCount[name] = 0;
            }
            // æ„å»ºä¹¦ç±ä¿¡æ¯å¯¹è±¡
            bookList.push({
                "name": name,
                "kind": item.itag || "",
                "intr": item.text || "",
                "cover": item.img || "",
                "bookid": item.id.book_id || "",
                "url": item.url || ""
            });
        });
    } else {
        // å¤„ç†å•ä¸ªä¹¦ç±ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œå°†å…¶æ”¾å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„ä¸­
        var singleBook = {
            "name": data.data.bookname || "",
            "author": data.data.author || "",
            "kind": data.data.itag || "",
            "intr": data.data.description || "",
            "lastest_chapter_name": data.data.lastest_chapter_name || "",
            "cover": data.data.img || "",
            "bookid": data.data.id.book_id || ""
        
        };
        bookList.push(singleBook);
    }
}

result = bookList;


</js>
ruleSearch.name: name

searchUrl:
<js>
(function() {
	
    var url="https://api.ttxz.eu.org"
    var key = java.key; 
    var pattern = /bqxs520\.com\/book\/(.*)\.shtml/; 
    var match = key.match(pattern); 
    var finalUrl;

    if (match && match.length > 1) {
       
        finalUrl = url+"/bqxs520/detail?book_id=" + match[1];
    } else {
       
        finalUrl = url+"/bqxs520/search?query=" + key;
    }

    // è¿”å›æœ€ç»ˆçš„URL
    return finalUrl;
})()
</js>
